highlights.title: 5th in Australia — U17 Boys
highlights.description: Ranked 5th nationally in the Under 17 Boys category in the January 2025 Table Tennis Australia national rankings, with 2,408 points.

highlights.title: 32nd in Australia — Open Men
highlights.description: Ranked 32nd in the Open Men national rankings (January 2025), competing against Australia's best players of all ages with a rating of over 2,000 points.

highlights.title: Australian National Championships
highlights.description: Competed at the 2024 Australian National Championships in July — his fourth consecutive Nationals appearance, having also competed in 2022 and 2023.

highlights.title: NSW City v Country Representative
highlights.description: Selected to represent his region in the annual NSW City v Country challenge, a prestigious state selection event.

highlights.title: Peak Rating of 1741
highlights.description: Achieved a career-high RatingsCentral rating of 1741 in September 2024, the culmination of nearly a decade of competitive development.

highlights.title: ACT Open Championships
highlights.description: Strong performance at the ACT Open Championships in September 2023, gaining 25 rating points in a single tournament against interstate competition.

videos.title: Highlights
videos.description: Match footage and highlights from Lachlan's competitive career.
